overview: Printemps Météore continues to travel, meet people and shoot. Berlin again, Burzet (in the Ardèche), the Chartreuse massif and, above all, the beginning of a new feature film (The Adventures of Eddie Turley) with Philip Dubuquoy, who was one of my first Cinématons in 1978 (No. 13)
title: Printemps Météore
